faq.question: How do I place an order?
faq.answer: Browse products, add items to your cart, and proceed to checkout by following the on-screen instructions.

faq.question: Can I change or cancel my order after placing it?
faq.answer: Orders can be changed or canceled within 2 hours of placing them. Please contact our support team as soon as possible.

faq.question: Do you have a mobile app?
faq.answer: Currently, we do not have a mobile app, but our website is fully mobile-friendly.

faq.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer: We accept credit/debit cards, UPI, PayPal, and other popular payment options.

faq.question: How can I contact customer support?
faq.answer: You can reach us via the chatbox, email at support@example.com, or call us at +91-XXXXXXXXXX.

faq.question: What are the delivery charges?
faq.answer: Delivery charges vary depending on the location. Free shipping is available for orders above ₹999.

faq.question: Do you offer international shipping?
faq.answer: Yes, we ship to selected countries. International shipping charges will apply.

faq.question: How long does delivery take?
faq.answer: Delivery usually takes 3–7 business days depending on your location.

faq.question: Can I track my order?
faq.answer: Yes, you can track your order using the tracking link sent to your email after dispatch.

faq.question: What is your return policy?
faq.answer: We offer a 7-day easy return policy for unused and undamaged items.

faq.question: How do I initiate a return or exchange?
faq.answer: Go to your orders section, select the product, and click on the return/exchange option.

faq.question: How long does it take to get a refund?
faq.answer: Refunds are processed within 5–7 business days after receiving the returned item.

faq.question: Do I need an account to place an order?
faq.answer: No, you can checkout as a guest, but creating an account helps track your orders easily.

faq.question: Do you offer custom printing?
faq.answer: Yes! We specialize in custom printing. You can upload your design on the product page.

faq.question: Do you offer bulk discounts?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer special discounts for bulk orders. Contact our support team for details.
